title: Electricity supply and healthcare declared essential services
content: A special gazette notification has declared the supply of electricity and provision of healthcare as essential services.The communiqu√© was issued on Friday (Feb. 11) by Secretary to the Head of State Gamini Senarath, on the directives of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.Thereby, electricity supply and provision of healthcare have been identified as essential services for the conduct of ordinary public life.
